mapper.update:
update T_HCRW
HCJH_ID = #{hcjhId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HCDW_XYDM = #{hcdwXydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HCDW_NAME = #{hcdwName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZFRY_CODE1 = #{zfryCode1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZFRY_CODE2 = #{zfryCode2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RWZT = #{rwzt,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
HCFL = #{hcfl,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
HCJG = #{hcjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HCJIEGUO = #{hcjieguo,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
JYZT = #{jyzt,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
HCJGGSQK = #{hcjggsqk,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
RLR = #{rlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RLRQ = #{rlrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SJWCRQ = #{sjwcrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZFRY_NAME1 = #{zfryName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZFRY_NAME2 = #{zfryName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HCJGMC = #{hcjgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DJJGMC = #{djjgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DJJG = #{djjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZTLX = #{ztlx,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ZZXS = #{zzxs,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
QYBM = #{qybm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QYMC = #{qymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RLRMC = #{rlrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JHWCRQ = #{jhwcrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ND = #{nd,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
JHMC = #{jhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JHXDRQ = #{jhxdrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DATA_LOADED = #{dataLoaded,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NR = #{nr,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
UPLOAD_FILES = #{uploadFiles,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JHBH = #{jhbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOC_READY_FLAG = #{docReadyFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
REPORT_DOC_READY_TIME = #{reportDocReadyTime,jdbcType=DATE},
DOC_READY_REPORTER = #{docReadyReporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOC_READY_REPORT_FLAG = #{docReadyReportFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
REQUIRED_FILES = #{requiredFiles,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REQUIRED_FILES_FUR = #{requiredFilesFur,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPLOAD_FILES_FUR = #{uploadFilesFur,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DOC_READY_FLAG_FUR = #{docReadyFlagFur,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PLAN_TYPE = #{planType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
AUDIT_RESULT = #{auditResult,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
AUDIT_COMMENT = #{auditComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDITOR_NAME = #{auditorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDIT_TIME = #{auditTime,jdbcType=DATE},
FINANCIAL_DATE = #{financialDate,jdbcType=DATE},
SELFCHECK_DATE = #{selfcheckDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_HCRW set HCJH_ID = #{hcjhId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HCDW_XYDM = #{hcdwXydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HCDW_NAME = #{hcdwName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZFRY_CODE1 = #{zfryCode1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZFRY_CODE2 = #{zfryCode2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RWZT = #{rwzt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HCFL = #{hcfl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HCJG = #{hcjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HCJIEGUO = #{hcjieguo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, JYZT = #{jyzt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HCJGGSQK = #{hcjggsqk,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, RLR = #{rlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RLRQ = #{rlrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SJWCRQ = #{sjwcrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZFRY_NAME1 = #{zfryName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZFRY_NAME2 = #{zfryName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HCJGMC = #{hcjgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DJJGMC = #{djjgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DJJG = #{djjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZTLX = #{ztlx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ZZXS = #{zzxs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, QYBM = #{qybm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QYMC = #{qymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RLRMC = #{rlrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JHWCRQ = #{jhwcrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ND = #{nd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, JHMC = #{jhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JHXDRQ = #{jhxdrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DATA_LOADED = #{dataLoaded,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NR = #{nr,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, UPLOAD_FILES = #{uploadFiles,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JHBH = #{jhbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOC_READY_FLAG = #{docReadyFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, REPORT_DOC_READY_TIME = #{reportDocReadyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, DOC_READY_REPORTER = #{docReadyReporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOC_READY_REPORT_FLAG = #{docReadyReportFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, REQUIRED_FILES = #{requiredFiles,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REQUIRED_FILES_FUR = #{requiredFilesFur,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPLOAD_FILES_FUR = #{uploadFilesFur,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DOC_READY_FLAG_FUR = #{docReadyFlagFur,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PLAN_TYPE = #{planType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, AUDIT_RESULT = #{auditResult,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, AUDIT_COMMENT = #{auditComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITOR_NAME = #{auditorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_TIME = #{auditTime,jdbcType=DATE}, FINANCIAL_DATE = #{financialDate,jdbcType=DATE}, SELFCHECK_DATE = #{selfcheckDate,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from T_HCRW where HCJH_ID = #{hcjhId} AND QYBM IN ( SELECT ID FROM SYS_ORGANIZATION START WITH ID IN ( SELECT ORG_ID FROM T_USER_ORG WHERE USER_ID=#{_userId}) CONNECT BY PRIOR ID=PARENT_ID )
AND HCJG like concat(#{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and audit_result is not null
ORDER BY
hcjg,djjg,hcdw_xydm,HCJGMC, ZFRY_NAME1, ZFRY_NAME2
hcjg,djjg,hcdw_xydm,ZZXS, HCJGMC

select
from T_HCRW where HCJH_ID = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY
${sort} ${order},
RLRQ
select COUNT(*) from T_HCRW WHERE hcjh_id = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select COUNT(*) from T_HCRW WHERE hcjh_id = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RLR IS NOT NULL AND rlrq IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE T_HCRW SET DATA_LOADED = 1 where HCJH_ID = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from T_HCRW where HCJH_ID = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and hcjg in (select id from sys_organization start with id=#{hcjg} connect by prior id=parent_id)
ORDER BY
${sort} ${order},
RLRQ
mapper.update: UPDATE T_HCRW SET RWZT = #{statusCode} where ID = #{taskId}
UPDATE T_HCRW SET JHXDRQ = SYSDATE, JHWCRQ = (SELECT YQWCSJ FROM T_HCJH WHERE ID=#{hcjhId}) where HCJH_ID = #{hcjhId}

update.if: UPDATE T_HCRW set DOC_READY_REPORT_FLAG=#{docReadyReportFlag}, REPORT_DOC_READY_TIME=sysdate, DOC_READY_REPORTER=#{userName} WHERE ID=#{hcrwId}
UPDATE T_HCRW set DOC_READY_REPORT_FLAG=#{docReadyReportFlag}, REPORT_DOC_READY_TIME=null, DOC_READY_REPORTER=null WHERE ID=#{hcrwId}
